simpleelytrahud.config.title: Elytra HUD options
simpleelytrahud.option.hud_toggle.descri: By toggling this you will turn of the HUD
simpleelytrahud.option.delay.description: Change the time it takes for the HUD to appear
simpleelytrahud.option.elytra_damage_lev: Turn of the display for the Elytras damage level
simpleelytrahud.option.coordinates_toggl: Toggle so you can't see the coordinates anymore
simpleelytrahud.option.speed.description: Change between the speed measurement. To the one you like
simpleelytrahud.option.position.descript: Change the position of the HUD on screen
Move HUD to screen edges, ignoring GUI safe area margins
